labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: It still sounds like you're calling
data.expected_result: The call sound should stop or you should receive a being called sound
data.short_description: When in a group DM and you call people, when one joins and you leave the call it still sounds like you're calling
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a group DM - Make sure there are 3 or more people in there - Call them - When one joins the call you leave the call - Listen
